Educational Qualifications: M. A. (Geography) Educated at M.B. College, Udaipur, Rajasthan
Other Information: Indian Police Service officer of 1969 batch of Rajasthan cadre served as Asstt. Superintendent of Police, 1969-73; Superintendent of Police, 1973-87; D.I.G. of Police, 1987-93; I.G. of Police, 1993-99; Additional D.G. of Police, 1999-2003; Member , State Human Rights Commission, Jaipur, 11 September, 2003- 22 March 2004; recipient of Presidential Police Medal and President`s Distinguished Service Medal.
Name: Meena,Shri Namo Narain
Positions Held:
2004
Elected to 14th Lok Sabha

May 2004 - May 2009
Union Minister of State, Environment and Forests

2009
Re-elected to 15th Lok Sabha (2nd term)

2009 - Oct. 2012 onwards
Union Minister of State, Finance
Permanent Address:
Village and Teh. - Bamanwas,
Distt. Sawai Madhopur Rajasthan
